aboutPage.title: ABOUT US
descriptionParagraphs: V.E.I Paramedical College Sindagi, under the aegis of Shreedevi Ishwar Shikshana Samsthe, is dedicated to nurturing skilled healthcare professionals who are committed to service, ethics, and excellence. Established with the vision of empowering rural and urban youth with quality paramedical education, our institution is a beacon of learning and compassion.

We offer a range of diploma and certification courses in paramedical sciences, designed to meet the growing demands of the healthcare sector. Our curriculum blends academic rigor with practical training, ensuring that students are well-prepared to meet real-world medical challenges.

Our highly qualified faculty, state-of-the-art laboratories, and strong industry collaborations provide a dynamic learning environment. At V.E.I Paramedical College, we believe in holistic development—where students grow intellectually, emotionally, and professionally.
We are proud to be shaping the next generation of healthcare heroes.

subscribeBox.message: Subscribe to our newsletter and stay updated on the latest news.

DHI.title: DHI (Diploma in Health Inspector)
DHI.details:
Intake 20 Seats / year

The duration of the above course will be PUC Science candidates 2 years + 3 month internship
and SSLC candidates 3 years + 3 month internship.

English, Physics, Chemistry and Biology of PUC standard shall be taught in the first year of
the course to SSLC candidates.
DHI.qualificationIntro:
Depending upon the candidate qualification.

Paramedical professionals hold an important place in the healthcare sector. Although the real
decision making lies in the hands of doctors and surgeons, paramedical professionals make sure
that the guidelines suggested by doctors are implemented in a proper manner.
qualifications: The completed person can get appointed as Junior Health Worker in PHC, CHC, Taluka Hospital & District Hospitals.
They can also appointed as Health Adviser in various medical colleges and hospitals.
They can also appointed as Health Worker in Municipality or Corporation.
They can also appointed as Health Sanitary and Hygiene Inspector in various food industries.

DMIT.title: DMIT (Diploma in Medical Imaging Technology) {X-Ray}
DMIT.details:
Intake 20 Seats / year

The duration of the above course will be PUC Science candidates 2 years + 3 month internship
and SSLC candidates 3 years + 3 month internship.

English, Physics, Chemistry and Biology of PUC standard shall be taught in the first year of
the course to SSLC candidates.
DMIT.qualificationIntro:
Depending upon the candidate qualification.

Diploma in Medical Imaging technologies is a radiographic course that deals with
electromagnetic radiations that penetrate human body. The students after successful
completion of the course have ample job opportunities. They are hired in clinics, hospitals,
diagnostic centers, etc.
qualifications: The completed person can get appointed as Imaging technician or X-Ray technician in Taluka Hospital & District Hospitals.
The completed person can get appointed as Imaging technician or X-Ray technician in various Hospitals, Medical Colleges.
They can open own X-Ray Center.
This course is approved for the Imaging technician or X-Ray technician job in Govt. and Private sectors throughout the India.
This course is also approved for the Imaging technician or X-Ray technician Job in abroad.

DMLT.title: DMLT (Diploma in Medical Laboratory Technology)
DMLT.details:
Intake 20 Seats / year

The duration of the above course will be PUC Science candidates 2 years + 3 month internship
and SSLC candidates 3 years + 3 month internship.

English, Physics, Chemistry and Biology of PUC standard shall be taught in the first year of
the course to SSLC candidates.
DMLT.qualificationIntro:
Depending upon the candidate qualification.

Diploma in Medical Laboratory Technology - DMLT, Medical Lab Technician Diploma course.
Medical laboratory technology is the branch of medical science responsible for performing
laboratory investigations relating to the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of disease.
qualifications: The completed person can get appointed as Lab Technologist in PHC, CHC, Taluka Hospital & District Hospitals.
The completed person can get appointed as Lab Technologist in various Hospitals, Pathological Laboratory, medical Colleges, Medical Research Laboratories etc.
They can open own laboratory.
This course is approved for the lab technologist job in Govt. and Private sectors throughout the India.
This course is also approved for the lab technologist Job in abroad.

rulesAndRegulations.title: Key aspects of admission rules and regulations include:

duration.heading: DURATION OF THE COURSES

points.text: The duration of the course will be:
subpoints: PUC Science candidates: 2 years + 3 months internship

points: English, Physics, Chemistry, and Biology of PUC standard shall be taught in the first year of the course to SSLC candidates.

qualification.heading: MINIMUM QUALIFICATION PRESCRIBED FOR ADMISSION
points: Pass in II PUC with Science subjects: PCB, PCMB, CBZ.
If sufficient PUC science candidates are not available, SSLC qualified candidates may be considered for admission.

documents.heading: ORIGINAL DOCUMENTS SUBMISSION FOR ADMISSION

points.text: All admitted students must submit original marks cards and certificates:

points: Admission will be rejected by the Paramedical Board if original documents are not submitted.

ageLimit.heading: AGE LIMIT FOR ADMISSION
points: Minimum age: 16 years as on 31st December of the year of admission.
English, Physics, Chemistry and Biology of PUC standard shall be taught in the first year to SSLC candidates.

dressCode.heading: DRESS CODE
points: White apron with Identity badge is compulsory (common for both boys and girls).
The institute may revise the dress code from time to time.

examination.heading: EXAMINATION
points: Two examinations are conducted every year – Annual and Supplementary – by the Para Medical Board.

eligibility.heading: ELIGIBILITY FOR TAKING EXAMINATION
points: 50% of Internal Assessment (IA) marks and 75% attendance are required to be eligible for exams.

transferCertificate.heading: ISSUE OF TRANSFER CERTIFICATE
points: There is no provision to issue Transfer Certificate to any candidate who completes Diploma successfully unless or otherwise he / she intends to persue higher studies based on Diploma Certificate issued by this College/Board.

cancellationPolicy.heading: ADMISSION CANCELLATION AND FEE REFUND POLICY
points: Once Admitted Candidate Any Reason  to Cancel Admission, Once Admitted Student Paid Fees Cannot be Refunded.

scholarshipLogin.title: How to Apply For SSP Scholarship
scholarshipLogin.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to apply for your scholarship:
scholarshipLogin.Note: Note: Submit your application before the deadline to avoid rejection.

step1.title: Step 1: Register on SSP Portal
Piont: Enter your Aadhaar number and verify it
Fill in the basic details and create your login credentials

step2.title: Step 2: Student Login
Piont: Enter your User ID and Password

step3.title: Step 3: Complete Profile
Piont: Fill in your academic, personal, and bank details
Upload documents (Aadhaar, income certificate, caste certificate, etc.)

step4.title: Step 4: Select ScholarShip Scheme
Piont: Choose your eligible scheme (e.g., Post–Matric, SC/ST, Minority)

step5.title: Step 5: Submit Application
Piont: Download/print the acknowledgment for future reference

passwordField.caseRequirement: Must include both uppercase and lowercase letters
passwordField.numberRequirement: Must include at least one number
passwordField.specialCharRequirement: Must include at least one special character
